sentences.sentence: If we always wait for another day, fruitlessly our life will pass away.
sentences.translation: 如果我们总是等着另一天，我们的生命将徒然流逝。

sentences.sentence: A handful of congressmen have called (fruitlessly) for him to be fired.
sentences.translation: 少数议员(徒劳的)要求他下岗。

sentences.sentence: We searched fruitlessly for thirty minutes until I had a third-degree sunburn on my bald spot.
sentences.translation: 我们搜索了三十多分钟，直到我的秃顶被日头晒的三度灼伤，也没有看到鞋的影子。
